price: কোৱা, ‘তোমালোকে অপেক্ষা কৰা, নিশ্চয় ময়ো তোমালোকৰ লগত অপেক্ষা কৰি আছোঁ’।
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
